statements: SELECT * FROM trade_settlement_data;
SELECT trade_id, counterparty_name, settlement_amount FROM trade_settlement_data ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, counterparty_name FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE regulatory_compliance = true;
SELECT * FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE transaction_type = 'Buy' AND settlement_amount > 1000;
SELECT trade_id, transaction_type FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE counterparty_name LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT trade_id, counterparty_name, settlement_amount FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE trade_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE settlement_amount > 50000 ORDER BY trade_date DESC, counterparty_name ASC
SELECT counterparty_name, transaction_type FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE regulatory_compliance = true
SELECT trade_id, settlement_amount, counterparty_name FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND transaction_type = 'Buy'
SELECT * FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE counterparty_name LIKE '%Corporation%'
SELECT * FROM trade_settlements;
SELECT trade_id, security, quantity FROM trade_settlements WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT trade_date, settlement_amount FROM trade_settlements WHERE trade_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT transaction_id, trade_id, compliance_details FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE trade_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM trade_settlements ORDER BY trade_date DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT trade_id, security, quantity FROM trade_settlements WHERE security='AAPL' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_id
SELECT t.trade_id, t.trade_date, r.compliance_status FROM trade_settlements t JOIN regulatory_compliance r ON t.trade_id = r.trade_id WHERE r.compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT trade_id, SUM(settlement_amount) AS total_amount FROM trade_settlements GROUP BY trade_id HAVING total_amount > 10000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT security, COUNT(*) AS trade_count FROM trade_settlements GROUP BY security HAVING trade_count > 1 ORDER BY trade_count DESC
SELECT * FROM trade_settlements;
SELECT trade_id, settlement_status, settlement_date FROM trade_settlements ORDER BY settlement_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_amount, trade_currency FROM trades WHERE trade_amount > 1000;
SELECT trade_id, compliance_status, regulatory_entity_name FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, trade_date FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_amount FROM trade_settlements WHERE settlement_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY trade_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, trade_amount, trade_currency FROM trades WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trade_date <= '2022-12-31' AND trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT rs.settlement_id, rs.trade_id, rs.settlement_date, r.compliance_status, r.regulatory_entity_name FROM trade_settlements rs JOIN regulatory_compliance r ON rs.trade_id = r.trade_id WHERE r.compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY rs.settlement_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.trade_id, t.trader_id, t.trade_date, tc.compliance_status, tc.compliance_check_date FROM trades t LEFT JOIN regulatory_compliance tc ON t.trade_id = tc.trade_id WHERE tc.compliance_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY t.trade_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_id, SUM(trade_amount) AS total_amount FROM trade_settlements GROUP BY trade_id HAVING total_amount > 10000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trade_settlements;
SELECT settlement_id, settlement_date, settlement_amount FROM trade_settlements WHERE regulatory_compliance = 'Compliant';
SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_type FROM trade_details WHERE trade_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY requirement_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, trade_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Payment';
SELECT * FROM trade_settlements WHERE settlement_amount > 1000 ORDER BY settlement_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_amount FROM trade_details WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT requirement_name, requirement_description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE LENGTH(requirement_description) > 50 ORDER BY requirement_id;
SELECT trade_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM trade_settlements WHERE regulatory_compliance LIKE '%compliant%' ORDER BY settlement_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, trade_date FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'Buy';
SELECT counterparty, settlement_amount FROM trades WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM trade_details ORDER BY settlement_date DESC;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM trade_parties WHERE party_type = 'Counterparty';
SELECT * FROM trades
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, trade_date FROM trades WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, settlement_amount FROM trades WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT t.trade_id, t.trade_type, td.settlement_status FROM trades t INNER JOIN trade_details td ON t.trade_id = td.trade_id
SELECT t.trade_id, t.trade_type, tp.party_name FROM trades t INNER JOIN trade_parties tp ON t.counterparty = tp.party_id
